name: Create new Award Force users from new rows in Google Sheets
description:
This template periodically checks for new rows in a source Google Sheet spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to create new users in Award Force. 

The template uses this [example spreadsheet.](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kwcSUV9DM8aIH6K87s7cnrLy9SX-GXHkiOhgESsXapY/edit?usp=sharing) You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template.
